properties.name: Options
properties.description: The options for the transit gateway vpc attachment.

type.description: The options for the transit gateway vpc attachment.

properties.name: ApplianceModeSupport
properties.description: Indicates whether to enable Ipv6 Support for Vpc Attachment. Valid Values: enable | disable

type.description: Indicates whether to enable Ipv6 Support for Vpc Attachment. Valid Values: enable | disable

properties.name: DnsSupport
properties.description: Indicates whether to enable DNS Support for Vpc Attachment. Valid Values: enable | disable

type.description: Indicates whether to enable DNS Support for Vpc Attachment. Valid Values: enable | disable

properties.name: Ipv6Support
properties.description: Indicates whether to enable Ipv6 Support for Vpc Attachment. Valid Values: enable | disable

type.description: Indicates whether to enable Ipv6 Support for Vpc Attachment. Valid Values: enable | disable

properties.name: SecurityGroupReferencingSupport
properties.description: Indicates whether to enable Security Group referencing support for Vpc Attachment. Valid values: enable | disable

type.description: Indicates whether to enable Security Group referencing support for Vpc Attachment. Valid values: enable | disable
